query_data¶

Analytical query layer for admissions reporting metrics.

query_data.run_analysis()[source]¶

Compute all dashboard metrics from the admissions table.

The function executes a sequence of SQL queries and aggregates answers into a dictionary consumed by the Flask analysis page and API.

Returns:

Analysis results keyed by metric name.

Return type:

dict[str, object]

Raises:

RuntimeError – If any individual query fails through execute_query.

query_data.execute_query(query)[source]¶

Execute a SQL query and return all result rows.

Parameters:

query (str) – SQL query text to execute.

Returns:

List of row tuples fetched from PostgreSQL.

Return type:

list[tuple]

Raises:

RuntimeError – Wrapped database exception with contextual message.
